casebody.data:
Billy HAMILTON, Plaintiff - Appellant/Cross-Appellee,
v.
NORTHFIELD INSURANCE COMPANY, Defendant - Appellee/Cross-Appellant. Oklahoma Association for Justice, Amicus Curiae. No. 17-7049 United States Court of Appeals, Tenth Circuit. FILED January 17, 2019

ORDER

This matter is before us on Appellant's Petition for Rehearing En Banc ("Petition"). Upon careful consideration of the Petition and the amicus brief filed by the Oklahoma Association for Justice, we sua sponte grant panel rehearing and vacate the opinion issued December 18, 2018. Accordingly, the Petition is denied as moot, and this matter is REOPENED and ABATED pending further order of the court.
